description: This Java source file defines the class `MockBasicCluster`, a mock implementation of a cluster in a Zigbee-like device simulation. It extends `MockCluster` and provides attributes for manufacturer, model, hardware version, firmware version, and manufacturing-specific attributes, along with methods to handle attribute data and commands.

classes.name: MockBasicCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a Basic Cluster for testing purposes, providing attribute management and command handling relevant to device identity and firmware.

methods.name: MockBasicCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing the cluster with manufacturer details, hardware and firmware versions, and optional manufacturing-specific attributes.

methods.name: getAttributeData
methods.description: Retrieves the byte array representing the value of a specified attribute.

methods.name: handleCommand
methods.description: Handles incoming commands based on command ID, such as resetting to factory defaults.

methods.name: getHardwareVersion
methods.description: Returns the hardware version as an integer.

methods.name: isDefaulted
methods.description: Returns whether the device is defaulted.
